QuestData.Title: Return to Arcanist Vandril
QuestData.Description: Now my friend, if you would be so kind as to return to Arcanist Vandril, I know that he is very anxious to send you out on your first mission here in the Ghostlands.$B$BWe're counting on you, $n. Don't let us down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Arcanist Vandril at Tranquillien in the Ghostlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh good, there you are! And just in time... there is much to be done!
